Articles.Content:
I was reminded of one nightmare I had a long time ago by a different thread, and that got me thinking about that heinous chomping piano. Which was scarier to you: the piano in Super Mario 64, or the manta ray in Super Mario Sunshine? I can hardly choose one or the other. Share your experiences with them here!

Edited June 9, 2016 by cubinator
I haven't played Super Mario Sunshine so it's definitely the piano.

No contest, the piano is way scarier. You can totally see the mantra ray coming , I mean the tree-man literally says that. The piano is a great jump scare. Nobody was ready for that; it certainly scared me! You can also kill the ray with what it basically a high-end pressure washer, you can't kill the piano at all.
I can easily avoid manta rays, but pianos? We have one of those in the house...I just wish it would stay in the same place...
..Can someone explain? I'm both curious and too scared to google the piano.

2 hours ago, Columbia said:

..Can someone explain? I'm both curious and too scared to google the piano. 

 

You'd have to play the game to understand. It's in the haunted house, and it's the WORST THING EVER!
i stopped playing mario when the bits got up to 32.
